test-set.name: prod-GeneralComp.eq
test-set.description: Tests for the GeneralComp production using the "=" operator

schema.description: A schema user defined types and constructor tests

test-case.name: K-GenCompEq-23
test-case.description: Comparison where type of operands are incompatible.
test-case.test: (xs:anyURI("example.com/"), 1, QName("example.com", "ncname"), false(), xs:hexBinary("FF")) = (xs:anyURI("example.com/NOT"), 0, QName("example.com", "p:ncname"), true(), xs:hexBinary("EF"))

test-case.name: GenCompEq-23
test-case.description: General comparison with a mixture of types on both sides.
